cast.name: 安东尼奥·阿尔巴内斯 Antonio Albanese
法布里齐奥·本蒂沃利奥 Fabrizio Bentivoglio
索尼娅·贝加马斯科 Sonia Bergamasco
吉亚科莫·费拉拉 Giacomo Ferrara
安德烈·拉坦兹 Andrea Lattanzi
维尼乔·马尔基奥尼 Vinicio Marchioni

writer.name: 伊妲·迪·贝尼代托 Ida Di Benedetto

introduction: Amelia is a woman already advanced in years who lives alone and teaches at the embroidery school in the heart of a Southern Italian city, in the Fifties. Her life is closed in the circle of small and repeated habits, a daily reality of loneliness e melancholy. Then, one day a stranger breaks into her house to inform her that a man called Felice is invoking her name on his deathbed. While not knowing neither of them, something mysterious inside Amelia is triggered, pushing her to follow that stranger against all reason. This is how in her daily life, suddenly a passage is opened, through which 'the others' can finally enter her life. First of all, a woman who has stolen her name, Marisa. Through her stolen name, Amelia will live the secret love between Felice and Marisa.
